title: [Large-scale] Collaborative Simulation-Based Domotics Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Electronic Device Operation Skills and Collaborative Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learners access the online platform via personal devices and perform collaborative activities through real-time video conferencing tools. They experience problem-solving processes via domotics design simulation.

learning_goals: Identify and explain the basic components of domotics systems
Propose domotics designs to solve real-life problems through collaborative simulations
Simulate simple smart home scenarios using modeling tools and analyze results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
